lead_paragraph: D'URSO--Onda. We mourn the loss of our lifelong business partner, Onda D'Urso and offer our deepest condolences to her children, Gary (Marina), Rodney, Marla and her grandson Ryan. The Partners of Clarendon Management Corp. London Terrace Gardens 1/3
